summary: Starter tier website plan for Countrypolitan: a quick, template‑based site featuring minimal copy and essential sections to showcase the antique, home & garden emporium.
sections: Contact Information (address, phone, hours, map link)
Social Media Links (Facebook feed or icon)
style_notes: Classic country vibe – earthy color palette (browns, muted greens, cream), serif type for headings, sans‑serif body text, subtle wood‑texture background, clean layout with generous whitespace.
